prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Piano, Drums, Organ, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Guitar, Piano, Drums, Organ - but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Bass, Guitar, Piano, Drums, Organ - omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Guitar, Piano, Drums, Organ - Synth Pad excluded.
